title: Gorgeous Gingerbread Biscuits
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '225g margarine, melted', '125ml evaporated milk', '350g black treacle', '3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3/4 teaspoon lemon extract', '500g plain flour']
